programme.title: Quebec and French relations
programme.short_synopsis: A brief history of Quebec and the American and Canadian relationship with France.
programme.medium_synopsis: The formation of Quebec, the American and Canadian relationship with France and the possibility of a divided neighbour to the north, are explored by Alistair Cooke.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
